modName: Logical Civil War Faction Armor Stats
summary: Changes stats of Stormcloak and Imperial Legion Armor to fit their visual appearence
descriptionHtml:
Have you ever tried to use the armor of the Civil War factions - only to realizie it's crap? When i first got the Imperial Studded Armor as a reward from Balgruuf and compared it too my tattered Fur Armor I decided to create this simple modification. How can a faction rule Tamriel or even Skyrim while having equipment worse than simple bandits!

Note: Be aware, that few starting armors (such as Fur, Hide) get less usefull (That's the object in fact). I started a new game and didn't notice a big difference, even on Expert difficulty, so i don't see any balancing problems.


Changes:

Stormcloak Light Armor:

- Cuirass and helm have slightly better stats than Leather Armor (Looks like wadded chain armor), but have increased weight (6 -> 8)
- Boots and gauntlets have stats equal to Leather
- Same stats for all hold guards

Stormcloak Bear Armor:

- Cuirass and helm stats equal to Leather
- Gauntlets and boots slightly better than Leather (7 -> 8) due to their studded appearance

Imperial Light Armor:

- Cuirass and helm and boots equal to Leather
- Bracer slightly weaker

Imperial Studded Cuirass:

- Stats slightly better than Leather (Chain Armor) and weight increased

Imperial Heavy Armor:

- Stats equal to Steel Armor (It is steel in fact!), but heavier

NPC Changes:

- Ulfric now has the perk, which allows him to use Shouts (I didn't get why he was not allowed to use them)
